content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_loans_test
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO ML.loans_test
(LoanID 1, CustomerID 2, LoanStatus 3, CurrentLoanAmount 4, Term 5, CreditScore 6, AnnualIncome 7, Yearsincurrentjob 8, HomeOwnership 9, Purpose 10, MonthlyDebt 11, YearsofCreditHistory 12, Monthssincelastdelinquent 13, NumberofOpenAccounts 14, NumberofCreditProblems 15, CurrentCreditBalance 16, MaximumOpenCredit 17, Bankruptcies 18, TaxLiens 19)
FROM 'https://adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/raw/MLExample/credit_test.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ML.loans_test
GO
